definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: have dominion, rule, dominate (NH [[רָדָה]], Targum:Jon [[רָדָא]], chastise; Ar raday tread, trample; Syr rdo0 chastise, also (and so As. radû) go, flow);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. consec. [[וְרָדוּ]] Is 14:2, Le 26:17; 2 mpl. [[רְדִיתֶם]] Ez Eze 34:4; Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יִרְדֶּנּוּ]] Le 25:53, [[וַיִּרְדֶָּנָּה]] La 1:13, juss. [[וְיֵרְדְּ]] Nu 24:19, Ps 72:8; 2 ms. [[תִּרְדֶּה]] Le 25:43, Le 25:46, etc.; Imv. ms. [[רְדֵה]] Psalm Ps 110:2; mpl. [[רְדוּ]] Ge 1:28 (Jn 4:13 v. [[ירד]]); Inf. cstr. [[רְדוֹת]] Ez Eze 29:15; Pt. [[רׂדֶת]] 1Ki 5:4, Is 14:6; sf. [[רׂדֵם]] Ps 68:28; pl. [[הָדׂדִים]] 1Ki 5:30 + 2 t.;—have dominion, rule, over, usu. c. [[ב]] pers. vel pop. 1Ki 5:4, 1Ki 5:30, 1Ki 9:23 = 2Ch 8:10, Is 14:2, Le 25:43, Le 25:46, Le 25:53, Le 26:17, Ez Eze 29:15, Ne 9:28, Ps 49:15; [[ב]] of fish, etc., Ge 1:26, Ge 1:28; [[בְּקֶרֶב]] Ps 110:2; c. acc. pers. Ez Eze 34:4, Is 14:6 (perh. + acc. cogn., v. [[[מִרְדָּה]]] infr.); acc. om. Nu 24:19 ([[מִיַעֲקׂב]]), Je 5:31 (+ [[עַל־יְדֵיהֶם]], v. [[יָד]]

definitions.title: 5 h
definitions.body: (2); vid. also ingenious conj. sub II. [[רדה]]; but < Gr [[יוֹרוּ]] teach), Ps 72:8; for [[וַיִרְדֶּנָּה]] La 1:13 and it (the fire) prevailed against them (my bones), read perh. [[יָרָָדָה]] into my bones it descended (Bu).—[[רׂדֵם]] Ps 68:28 is dub.; Grill Hup-Now Che Du [[קִדֵם]]. [[יְרַד]] Ju Jdg 5:13, Jdg 5:13 v. [[יָרַד]].

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[וּמְלָכִים יַרְדְּ]] Is 41:2 and kings he causeth (him) to dominate; but apoc. form strange, read [[יָרׂד]] (√ [[רדד]] q. v.) Ew Di Du; [[יַחֲרִד]] LXX Klo Che.
